name: maltodextrin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a substance that is sometimes added to food to improve the way it looks or feels: The company uses an additive called maltodextrin as a thickener in its low-calorie ice-cream. Maltodextrin can be found as an ingredient in many artificial sweetener brands.
More examplesFewer examplesMaltodextrin made from corn syrup is sprayed on instant coffee to keep the granules free flowing. We cooled the mixture down and puréed it with an equal amount of tapioca maltodextrin.
